actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myconid can use its Eject Spores. It then makes two Spore-Coated Fist attacks.

actions.name: Spore-Coated Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Eject Spores
actions.desc: The myconid ejects one of the following types of spores at one creature it can see within 15 feet of it.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
special_abilities.desc: The deathcap takes 10 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
